attributes.action: Devolve broadcasting to the Scottish Parliament
attributes.additional_details: Scotland has no devolved broadcasting. Denmark devolves broadcasting to the Faroe Islands. Spain devolves to Catalonia.  Why not UK to Scotland.
attributes.background: Work with Scottish Government to devolve broadcasting.

departments.name: Office of the Secretary of State for Scotland
